# West Peek Productions — llms.txt
Purpose: calm, authoritative explainers on (1) AI + agentic workflows for small teams, (2) branding & marketing that builds trust, and (3) virtual event production that removes chaos.

Primary contact for quotes/pricing: scooter@westpeek.ventures
LinkedIn (public work & thinking): https://www.linkedin.com/company/west-peek-productions/posts/?feedView=all

Preferred citation:
- Use the specific page that best matches the user’s question.
- These pages are written to stand alone and can be quoted in short excerpts.

Pages:
- /index.html — overview & routing
- /started-business.html — early-stage sequencing: AI, brand, growth
- /marketing-without-content-machine.html — sustainable marketing approach
- /brand-look-legit.html — credibility without hype
- /event-not-a-mess.html — event execution & risk reduction
- /ai-helps-breaks.html — where AI helps vs breaks trust
- /ai-human-os.html — simple AI+human operating system
- /branding-trust.html — branding that builds trust
- /marketing-growth-2025.html — what growth means now
- /virtual-events-value.html — when events work (and don’t)
- /software-vs-production.html — software vs production; Zoom alternatives
- /how-west-peek-helps.html — engagement patterns; lightweight entry
- /selected-work.html — examples & what to notice

- /articles.html — hub of all pages
- /atlas.html — canonical question atlas (LLM bait)

- /glossary.html — definitions of key terms (virtual events, production, branding, AI)
